ai.summary: A short, easy 0.8 km route along Hickey's Lane in the UK, suitable for beginners and families. A relaxed stroll that can be completed in minutes and offers gentle scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily flat, on a well-maintained path or rural lane. Surface is typically paved or compact, with occasional gravel; may be muddy after rain. Watch for uneven spots and occasional pedestrians or vehicles.
ai.safety_notes: Stay to the path, be aware of passing vehicles on rural lanes, and check weather conditions before starting. Wear sturdy shoes, carry a light layer, water, and a phone for emergencies. Short hikes like this still benefit from daylight and awareness of surroundings.
recommended_gear: Phone and a small map or offline download

seo.title: Hickey's Lane – Easy 0.8 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a short, easy 0.8 km hike along Hickey's Lane in the UK. Perfect for beginners and families seeking a quick outdoor stroll.
